channel.title: I figured out how to add commands that allow you to turn pking on and off
channel.description: After about 2+ hours (I'm not even kidding) I finnaly got two commands working that I made that allow you to turn pking in your existing pk server off with simple commands. You have to find and change a lot of things. It took so long because I was starting from a command I had heard of in another server and went from there. Anyway now it's working. Do you guys think I should make a tut on how I did it? It would be my first tut. It would be pretty long though too, anyway I just wanted your guys opionon.

item.title: I figured out how to add commands that allow you to turn pking on and off
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

slay blad3:

haha i did the same thing with my ::setitem auto IP ban but it only took me 30 mins so i feel 1/4 of your pain ;D

I just coded in glows for pmod admins and owner, but that was a lot easier but I still did it myself, it’s not as much as a triumph as the first code though. It feels much better when it wasn’t working and yada yada when you finnaly get it working.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 05:54:42 PM[/size][hr]can somebody point me to the tutorial…maybe I can make a better one

Read full topic

I rarely use tutorials, scripting is all the fun…or why else would you host?

Congratulations on your script though thats great :D[/quote]
